title: Australian [colour] diary. No. 018
brief_description: Featured in this cinemagazine is a migrant’s success story with a costume jewellery business; translating over twenty of our wildflowers into unusual pieces in their original colours. Picturesque Widden Valley in Central new South Wales supports many herds of prime stock including Santa Gertrudas and Herefords, as well as its famous horse studs.
